item.title: New design for the blog!
item.description: I’m really excited for this! Don’t ask me why because I can’t explain it. This is not the first time I make a new design for this blog, it’s actually the fifth time! and yet, I feel this is the best one yet. It have everything I ever wanted in my blog. Â 1. New Design I can’t even start to describe to you how much I feel this design is perfect for this blog.
